trans-unit.source: Provides data for the <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadGrammarCompleted" name="LoadGrammarCompleted" href=""></xref> event of a <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"></xref> or <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Gir dataene for den <xref uid="langword_csharp_LoadGrammarCompleted" name="LoadGrammarCompleted" href=""> </xref> hendelse for en <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer"> </xref> eller <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine"> </xref> objektet.

trans-unit.source: An instance of `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` is created when the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> or the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> object raises its <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> event.
trans-unit.target: En forekomst av `LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs` opprettes når den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>objekt hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName>eller <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer>objekt hever den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted>hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer.LoadGrammarCompleted> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognizer> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine.LoadGrammarCompleted?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.SpeechRecognitionEngine>

trans-unit.source: The events are raised when calls to the `LoadGrammarAsync` methods complete.
trans-unit.target: Hendelsene aktiveres ved kall til den `LoadGrammarAsync` metoder fullføre.

trans-unit.source: To obtain information about the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> object that was loaded, access the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> property in the handler for the event.
trans-unit.target: Å få informasjon om den <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>objektet som ble lastet inn, tilgang av <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A>egenskap i et behandlingsprogram for hendelsen.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.LoadGrammarCompletedEventArgs.Grammar%2A> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak under operasjonen for gjenkjenneren den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>er satt til unntaket og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>kan være `false`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> object that has completed loading.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> objekt som innlastingen er fullført.

trans-unit.source: If the recognizer encounters an exception during the operation, the <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A> property is set to the exception and the <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> property of the associated <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> may be `false`.
trans-unit.target: Hvis det oppstår et unntak under operasjonen for gjenkjenneren den <xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>er satt til unntaket og <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A>for den tilknyttede <xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar>kan være `false`.</xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar> </xref:System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar.Loaded%2A> </xref:System.ComponentModel.AsyncCompletedEventArgs.Error%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"></xref> that was loaded by the recognizer.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Speech.Recognition.Grammar"> </xref> som ble lastet inn kontrolleres.
